title: The Luxury Closet - Buy & Sell Authentic Luxury

container.value: Tradelux General Trading, 901, API Trio Tower, Novotel Al Barsha, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

creator: The Luxury Closet
descriptionHtml:
When it comes to luxury, we deliver in spades! The Luxury Closet is a marketplace to dive deep into the world of high-end products from top designers across the globe. With a deep understanding of the pre-loved luxury industry since 2011, The Luxury Closet is a market leader in the Middle East. Other than catering to discerning individuals in the Middle East, The Luxury Closet accepts and ships authentic luxury items to 90+ countries that span Asia, North America, Africa, South America, Australia, Europe, and Oceania.

6 reasons why TLC is the app for you:
- AUTHENTICITY GUARANTEED! All items are authenticated by our in-house team of experts.
- Enjoy up to 90% off on popular styles.
- Speedy delivery. We ship orders within 2 days!
- State-of-the-art packaging. Receive carefully packaged goods that delight.
- Hassle-free returns. If buying is easy, returning should be too!
- 100% Refund.

Marketplace for Sellers and Buyers
The Luxury Closet is a platform where you can SELL and BUY the most extensive range of new and pre-loved designer creations from leading luxury fashion brands. Buying and selling on TLC App is surprisingly easy and hassle-free with a user-friendly interface, smooth payment procedure, and a responsive, solution-finding customer service team.

Our Catalogue
The Luxury Closet is home to over 300+ fashion brands, including heritage houses and contemporary labels. Find the best of handbags, shoes, clothing, accessories, homeware and more from:
- Iconic names like Louis Vuitton, Burberry, Hermès, Chanel, Gucci, Balenciaga, Rolex and Cartier.
- Celebrity-favourites like Céline, Dior, Versace, Fendi, Christian Louboutin and Valentino.
- Streetwear and athleisure giants such as Adidas, OFF-WHITE, Supreme, Yeezy, and Nike.

Discover popular styles at never-seen prices:
- Chanel Flap bag, Lady Dior, Louis Vuitton Neverfull, Céline Luggage tote, Gucci Marmont, Hermès Birkin and Goyard totes.
- Rolex Datejust, Hublot Big Bang, Cartier Tank, and TAG Heuer Formula 1.
- Balenciaga Triple S, Yeezy Boost 350, Valentino Rockstud, Gucci Ace, and Manolo Blahnik Hangisi.
- Cartier LOVE, Return to Tiffany, Bvlgari B.Zero1, Alhambra from Van Cleef & Arpels, and Clic-Clac by Hermès.

Shop with us!
Now you don’t have to break the bank every time you want to splurge on a designer piece; instead, you can pay a sweet visit to the TLC App and buy authentic luxury creations at rates much lower than the original retail price. With this, you get the opportunity to renew your closet and enjoy new trends! Here are a few more reasons why your next shopping spree should be at The Luxury Closet:

- Find vintage pieces, coveted but discontinued styles, and special limited editions at discounted rates.
- Enjoy a number of exclusively curated sales with BRAND NEW products from high-end labels.
- Have the most seamless shopping experience with quick and easy checkouts, thanks to the multiple payment methods we accept: COD, Bank Transfer, Credit Card, and PayPal.
- Earn TLC Cash as cashback reward every time you shop with us.

Sell with us!
Selling with us is as easy as it gets! Whether you want to purge those stylish wardrobes and make way for the new or have changed your mind about a spontaneous purchase, The Luxury Closet is the place for you.

We accept a range of luxury items across clothing, fine jewelry, shoes, handbags, watches, and accessories. Whether they are new or well-used, we authenticate and list your products to offer them global exposure to our vast buyer audience.

Your experience with The Luxury Closet is important to us and to keep it special every time, we offer you several benefits:

- VIP Concierge Service that ensures a high-end experience.
- Attractive payments and low commissions.
- Easy payout.
- Scheduled pick-ups.
- Authentication, a professional photoshoot and managing sale status.

Turn your closets into assets and join the changing world by contributing to a circular & sustainable fashion culture.
descriptionShort: Buy and sell authentic new and pre-owned luxury brands

appDetails.developerAddress: Tradelux General Trading, 901, API Trio Tower, Novotel Al Barsha, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

Buying and selling on TLC App is surprisingly easy and hassle-free with a user-friendly interface, smooth payment procedure, and a responsive, solution-finding customer service team.

Our Catalogue
The Luxury Closet is home to over 300+ fashion brands, including heritage houses and contemporary labels. Find the best of handbags, shoes, clothing, accessories, homeware and more from:
- Iconic names like Louis Vuitton, Burberry, Hermès, Chanel, Gucci, Balenciaga, Rolex and Cartier.
- Celebrity-favourites like Céline, Dior, Versace, Fendi, Christian Louboutin and Valentino.
- Streetwear and athleisure giants such as Adidas, OFF-WHITE, Supreme, Yeezy, and Nike.

Discover popular styles at never-seen prices:
- Chanel Flap bag, Lady Dior, Louis Vuitton Neverfull, Céline Luggage tote, Gucci Marmont, Hermès Birkin and Goyard totes.
- Rolex Datejust, Hublot Big Bang, Cartier Tank, and TAG Heuer Formula 1.
- Balenciaga Triple S, Yeezy Boost 350, Valentino Rockstud, Gucci Ace, and Manolo Blahnik Hangisi.
- Cartier LOVE, Return to Tiffany, Bvlgari B.Zero1, Alhambra from Van Cleef & Arpels, and Clic-Clac by Hermès.

Shop with us!
Now you don’t have to break the bank every time you want to splurge on a designer piece; instead, you can pay a sweet visit to the TLC App and buy authentic luxury creations at rates much lower than the original retail price. With this, you get the opportunity to renew your closet and enjoy new trends! Here are a few more reasons why your next shopping spree should be at The Luxury Closet:

- Find vintage pieces, coveted but discontinued styles, and special limited editions at discounted rates.
- Enjoy a number of exclusively curated sales with BRAND NEW products from high-end labels.
- Have the most seamless shopping experience with quick and easy checkouts, thanks to the multiple payment methods we accept: COD, Bank Transfer, Credit Card, and PayPal.
- Earn TLC Cash as cashback reward every time you shop with us.

Sell with us!
Selling with us is as easy as it gets! Whether you want to purge those stylish wardrobes and make way for the new or have changed your mind about a spontaneous purchase, The Luxury Closet is the place for you.

We accept a range of luxury items across clothing, fine jewelry, shoes, handbags, watches, and accessories. Whether they are new or well-used, we authenticate and list your products to offer them global exposure to our vast buyer audience.

Your experience with The Luxury Closet is important to us and to keep it special every time, we offer you several benefits:

- VIP Concierge Service that ensures a high-end experience.
- Attractive payments and low commissions.
- Easy payout.
- Scheduled pick-ups.
- Authentication, a professional photoshoot and managing sale status.

Turn your closets into assets and join the changing world by contributing to a circular & sustainable fashion culture.

creator: The Luxury Closet
descriptionHtml:
Buy & Sell Authentic Luxury Brand Online

The Luxury Closet is a leading resale platform established in 2012 in Dubai. With a firm focus on sustainability, authenticity, and unparalleled customer service, we offer an opportunity to consciously engage in luxury goods while making a positive impact on the environment. As a trusted platform for buyers and sellers, The Luxury Closet is the ultimate destination for fashion lovers. We also offer a unique opportunity for shoppers to purchase from the stunning wardrobes of famed personalities through our exclusive Celebrity Closets series.

ACCESS LUXURY ANYWHERE, ANYTIME WITH OUR APP
1. Get real-time alerts about offers & deals via push notifications
2. Effortless browsing with our user-friendly app interface
3. Discover new items added every day from 300+ designer labels
4. Selling is quicker with the app; click, upload, and sit back while we list your item
5. Curate your wishlist with our easy-to-use filters

OUR CATALOGUE:
The Luxury Closet offers a diverse collection of over 300 high-end brands, from historic to contemporary labels. Our inventory includes a vast selection of handbags, shoes, clothing, accessories, and other luxury items.

1. Heritage brands like Cartier, Tiffany & Co., Louis Vuitton, Hermès, Chanel, Burberry, Loro Piana, and Goyard.

2. Iconic names like Yves Saint Laurent, Gucci, Dolce & Gabbana, Valentino, Dior, Givenchy, Versace, and Prada.

3. Find on-trend designers such as The Row, The Attico, Jacquemus, Amina Mudaddi, Vetements, and Ganni.

Explore the most coveted fashion styles and categories:

- Hermès Birkin, Lady Dior, Fendi bags, Louis Vuitton Neverfull, Chanel handbags,
- Rolex Datejust, Cartier Tank, Jaeger-LeCoultre watches, and Audemars Piguet Royal Oak
- Chanel CC slingbacks, Prada logo loafers, Gucci Princetown, Hermès Oran, and Manolo Blahnik Hangisi
- Cartier bracelets, Return to Tiffany, Bvlgari B.Zero1, Alhambra from Van Cleef & Arpels, and Messika jewelry


SHOP WITH US:
From new & pre-loved designer handbags and footwear to fine jewelry and homeware, you will find everything in one place at never-seen-before prices. The app gives you a chance to score authentic vintage luxury items, update your wardrobe often, and find great deals on your favorite items. Here are some more reasons why you should shop with us:

1. AUTHENTICITY GUARANTEED! Our authenticators examine every item to make sure you get the real deal.
2. Our seamless checkout process with COD, Credit Card, and PayPal and fast, reliable shipping ensure that your luxury purchase reaches you in no time.
3. Find vintage pieces, coveted but discontinued styles, and limited editions that are unavailable in retail stores.
4. Get access to designer pieces owned by notable celebrities and influencers.

SELL AND EARN WITH US:
Looking to clear out your closet and create space for new items? Or is it time for spring cleaning? No matter the reason, we are here to help because selling with us is fast, easy, and hassle-free — a process trusted by thousands of sellers worldwide.

We accept a variety of luxury items, including clothing, fine jewelry, homeware, shoes, handbags, watches, and accessories. Whether your items are in pristine or well-used condition, we authenticate and list each of your items for our global buyer audience. The Luxury Closet values your experience, and that's why we offer several benefits to enhance your selling journey:

1. Get access to our special VIP Concierge service and become a VIP seller when you sell 5+ or high-value items
2. Enjoy free scheduled pick-ups of your items
3. Our experts handle the authentication, professional photo shoot, and management of the sale status of your items
4. Earn high commissions and up to 90% payouts
5. Easy & safe payment options

By giving new life to pre-loved luxury, we're taking a step together toward promoting a more circular fashion culture. Join us! Install THE LUXURY CLOSET app today!
